TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PersonalizationEntry extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示 对象包含的自定义个性化设置状态信息的核心项。

span.span: Represents core pieces of custom personalization state information contained in a object.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类表示由接口提供的对象中包含的自定义状态信息的各个部分 。This class represents pieces of custom state information contained in the object made available by the interface. 此信息由个性化设置基础结构中的其他类和接口使用。This information is used by other classes and interfaces in the personalization infrastructure.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls
Web Parts Personalization Overview

related.span: 演练：使用用户控件实现 Web 部件个性化设置

span.span: Walkthrough: Implementing Web Parts Personalization with a User Control
Web Parts Personalization

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请注意，参数中包含的自定义状态信息 `value` 必须具有在参数中指定的关联范围 `scope` 。Note that the custom state information contained in the `value` parameter must have an associated scope as specified in the `scope` parameter. 中的条目 必须显式指示是否将一段自定义数据视为可在或范围内的可个性化数据 。Entries in the must explicitly indicate whether a piece of custom data is considered personalizable in or scope. 在此构造函数中，属性的值 默认为 `false` 。In this constructor, the value for the property defaults to `false`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数允许你创建一个 ，其中包含不应在导出的 Web 部件格式中序列化的数据。This constructor allows you to create a that contains data that should not be serialized in the exported Web Part format. 如果将的值设置 `isSensitive` 为 `true` ，则 Web 部件导出处理程序不会序列化要导出的数据。If you set the value of `isSensitive` to `true`, the Web Parts export handler will not serialize the data for export.

summary.span: 获取或设置指示 是否包含敏感信息的布尔值。

span.span: Gets or sets the Boolean value that indicates if the contains sensitive information.

value.span: 如果该特性设置了敏感设置，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the sensitive setting for the attribute is set; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 部件的个性化设置信息可以包含不应导出到其他控件的敏感数据。Web Parts personalization information can contain sensitive data that should not be exported to other controls. 此属性由 Web 部件导入和导出过程使用。This property is used by the Web Parts import and export process. 如果将设置 为， `true` 则会导致 Web 部件导出处理程序不会将数据序列化为导出的 Web 部件格式。Setting to `true` causes the Web Parts export handler to not serialize the data in the exported Web Part format.

summary.span: 获取或设置与此个性化设置数据项关联的个性化设置范围。

span.span: Gets or sets the personalization scope associated with this personalization data entry.

value.span: 与此个性化设置数据项关联的个性化设置范围。

span.span: The personalization scope associated with this personalization data entry.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的作用类似于使用类指定与公共属性关联的作用域 。This property's effect is similar to specifying the scope associated with a public property using the class. 您可以使用此属性设置构成实例的个性化设置信息的个性化设置范围 。You can use this property to set the personalization scope of the personalization information that makes up the instance. 所有条目都必须有与其相关联的作用域。All entries must have a scope associated with it.

span.span: Gets or sets the personalization state information for this entry.

span.span: An object representing personalization state information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请注意，此属性中包含的自定义状态信息必须有一个关联的作用域，并在属性中指定 。Note that the custom state information contained in this property must have an associated scope, specified in the property. 此属性可以设置为 `null` 。This property can be set to `null`.
